entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Providence
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:56 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.3°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -38.3°C

Humidity: 67 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 37 by morning. POP 30%
